NJOY nuclear data processing from LANL Website for documentation and code for the development of NJOY, a nuclear data processing code from Los Alamos National Laboratory. All source code as part of the NJOY project—including this website—is covered by the BSD, 3-clause license, as detailed in the license file. LANL code designation LA-CC-15-092.
